meanings.sent1: The local turnvereins organized a gymnastics competition.
meanings.sent2: I joined the turnvereins in my town to practice gymnastics.
meanings.sent3: The turnvereins had a funny mascot, a gymnastic bear.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the turnvereins was as strong as a gymnast's muscles.
meanings.sent5: The colorful uniforms of the turnvereins made them stand out at the parade.

meanings.sent1: The turnvereins gathered for their weekly gymnastics session.
meanings.sent2: She met many new friends among the turnvereins.
meanings.sent3: The turnvereins decided to have a picnic to bond outside of gymnastics.
meanings.sent4: In their matching uniforms, the turnvereins looked like a team of superheroes.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of camaraderie among the turnvereins was truly inspiring.
